entry.title: ARCTIC OUTFLOW WARNING , Pemberton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 07:30 AM PST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -4.4°C

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 7.
